name: Doortwo
description:
Overview

Doortwo is a game with a simple idea that gets more and more difficult as you progress through the levels where you have to get the two friends out of the rooms.

Play

Get the frog and Fion together to get out of the room.

Features

1- A simple idea.

2- Simple graphics.

3- Contains 50 stages.

4- Two characters with one control.

5- Lots of puzzles.

6- It gets more difficult as you progress through the stages.

7- There is a button for help.
